meta_description: Welcome to the Akron Art Museum, home of over 6000 works of modern and contemporary art. We invite all people to enrich their lives with art.
hours_text:
# WELCOME

**Effective May 15, 2025: Due to renovation construction, the Open Studio space is currently unavailable. Please check our[families page](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114070551/https://akronartmuseum.org/families/) for free art making resources and activities in the Museum and our _[calendar](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114070551/https://akronartmuseum.org/calendar/)_ for upcoming family events.**

## **Open Hours for Galleries, Garden, and Gift Shop:**

**Wednesday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday 11:00 am – 5:00 pm.  
Thursday 11:00 am – 9:00 pm.  
****Closed: Monday and Tuesday.**

Closed Memorial Day, Fourth of July, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, Christmas, and New Years Day.****

Members receive complimentary admission.****

**Non-member admission:**  
**Adult general admission is $12.**  
**Senior (65+) general admission is $10.**  
**Student (with valid ID) $8. University of Akron Students, Faculty and Staff (with valid Zip Card) receive complimentary admission.**  
**Children (17 and under) are FREE.**  
**Adult with Ohio EBT card $3 (discount available for up to 4 adults per EBT card).  
Gallery admission is FREE every Thursday.  
**

**Blue Star Families**

**Akron Art Museum extends free admission to our nation’s active-duty military personnel – including National Guard and Reserve and their families all year long.**

## ACCESSIBILITY & ACCOMMODATION

The Akron Art Museum is KultureCity® Sensory Inclusive™ Certified. To learn more about thi...
